data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 237 neighbors who are far from you in Sisacko-Moslavacka. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sisacko-Moslavacka, Croatia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Sisacko-Moslavacka, Croatia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Sisacko-Moslavacka, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Sisacko-Moslavacka, Croatia that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Bosniak people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Bosniak people.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Sisacko-Moslavacka with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Sisacko-Moslavacka, Croatia that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Sisacko-Moslavacka, Croatia.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.
